page.title: 20The Councillor(3)
page.content: { Our Councillor}is sure that{ {Gretna}will continue to flourish in the future.It is hoped,in the long term,to provide a games hall but the cost means that it may be many years before this can be considered.A new{ {police station}is to be built in the near future.Under consideration at the moment is the provision of{indoor {roller skating}and a{public park.} {Richard's}main worry is the senseless vandalism for which a minority are responsible but which has a far reaching effect,not least on finance.That apart the{local {councillor}forecasts a bright{future} for{Gretna.}
